amendment.description: Amendment provides $50 million for the the Family Advocacy Program administered by the Defense Department.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer $50 million from the Defense-Wide Operations and Management account to the Family Advocacy Program that is administered by the Defense Department. The program provides counseling to military families as they transition back into civilian life.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
